uk.ac.ebi.mdk.ui.render.list
Class ClassBasedListCellDDR

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.mdk.ui.render.list.ClassBasedListCellDDR
All Implemented Interfaces:
ListCellRenderer
public class ClassBasedListCellDDR
extends Object
implements ListCellRenderer

Adapted from code:
A class-based display delegation renderer. Uses a map that maps classes to renderers to decide to which renderer to delegate the display request to. In case of a class that is not in the map, the renderer performs a BFS up the class hierarchy to find a class for which a renderer was specified.
See article for full details.
Article

Author:
Michael Bar-Sinai mich.barsinai@gmail.com

getExplicitRenderer

protected ListCellRenderer getExplicitRenderer(Class<?> valClass)
Returns the "most appropriate" renderer for instances of valClass We do a BFS run over the super-classes and interfaces of the object. See article for full description.

Parameters:
o - the object whose super types we want to list
Returns:
the super types, ordered by relevance.
